txt.en: The ancient tomb has become inhabited by malicious spirits and beasts. Purging the tomb of these hostile intruders will help restore peace to this once tranquil Gondorian crypt.
You have defeated many of the hostile inhabitants of the ancient tomb. In time, peace and order may be restored to this once calm resting place.
The ancient tomb has become inhabited by malicious spirits and beasts. Purging the tomb of these hostile intruders will help restore peace to this once tranquil Gondorian crypt.
Defeat wights within the ancient tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The ancient tomb can be found in the eastern section of the Norcrofts, just south of Elthengels.\n\nThe inhabitants of the crypt must be dealt with to restore the deserving tranquility of those entombed.
Defeat bats and rats within the ancient tomb ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have defeated many of the hostile inhabitants of the ancient tomb. In time, peace and order may be restored to this once calm resting place.
